DOC.detailed_description: The medical treatment idiopathic Parkinson 's disease ( IPD ) alleviate constipation symptom due restoration autonomic dysfunction . However , additional laxative usually need patient . Other suppository treatment include stool softener , dopamine-receptor agonist , botulinum toxin , prokinetic medication tegaserod . Biofeedback therapy ( BFT ) gold standard functional constipation dyssynergic defecation rectal hyposensitivity . However , researcher try evaluate usefulness constipate IPD patient .
